options.keywords: custom database search engine, search relevance, fuzzy matching, predictive search, typo tolerance, compound search queries, autocomplete search, search scoring, search API, in-app search, product catalog search, lucene facets, faceted search, lucene analyzers
options.description: Use MongoDB Atlas Search to customize and embed a full-text search engine in your app.

children.value: is an embedded full-text search in

that
gives you a seamless, scalable experience for building
relevance-based app features. Built on Apache Lucene,

eliminates the need to run a separate search system alongside your
database.

options.alt: MongoDB Atlas Search landing page hero image

children.value:
Easily build search on top of your data with an integrated, fully
managed search engine that automatically syncs to your database.

Create index definitions for your data using editors in the
Atlas UI, with a single

Admin API call, or
using the Atlas CLI.
Refer to our guidelines on scaling and monitoring
